Job Categories

Technology and IT

Roles include software developer, network engineer, IT manager, and systems analyst. These jobs involve creating and managing technology systems and networks.

Healthcare

Jobs such as doctor, nurse, pharmacist, and physical therapist. These roles focus on patient care, health, and wellness.

Business and Management

Positions like marketing manager, financial analyst, and HR manager. These jobs involve strategic planning, financial management, and human resources.

Education

Roles such as teacher, professor, and instructional coordinator. These jobs focus on education, training, and knowledge sharing.
